musicalLanguage.description: A tender, nostalgic reverie — perhaps the most famous character piece of the Romantic era. The melody rises and falls like gentle breathing.
musicalLanguage.structure: ABA': two statements of the theme with a contrasting middle
keyMoments: Opening: the rising melody reaches upward like a sigh
Peak: the melody reaches its highest point
Return: the dream resumes, fading to a peaceful close
teachingGoals: Voicing a melody within chordal texture
styleTips: The melody must float above the inner voices
Imagine a child daydreaming — unhurried, gentle
Subtle rubato at phrase peaks and endings
